snippet: The guard who brought Linsanity to the N.B.A. will play in a preseason game in the nation where his parents were born and raised.
lead_paragraph: The guard who brought Linsanity to the N.B.A. will play in a preseason game in the nation where his parents were born and raised.

headline.main: Far-Flung N.B.A. Preseason Journeys Include Lin’s Return to His Roots
headline.print_headline: Far-Flung N.B.A. Preseason Journeys Include Lin’s Return to His Roots
